# Extreme Networks ExtremeXOS LAG Configuration
# X670-G2 Switch with LACP

configure snmp sysname "exos-lag-switch"

# Create VLANs
create vlan "Server" tag 100
create vlan "Storage" tag 200
create vlan "Backup" tag 300

# LAG Configuration with LACP
enable sharing 1:49 grouping 1:49-1:50 algorithm address-based L3_L4 lacp
enable sharing 1:51 grouping 1:51-1:52 algorithm address-based L3_L4 lacp

# Static LAG (no LACP)
enable sharing 2:1 grouping 2:1-2:2 algorithm address-based L3

# Add LAG to VLANs
configure vlan Server add ports 1:49 tagged
configure vlan Storage add ports 1:49 tagged
configure vlan Backup add ports 1:51 tagged

# LACP System Priority
configure lacp system-priority 32768

# LACP timeout
configure sharing 1:49 lacp timeout short
configure sharing 1:51 lacp timeout long

# Spanning Tree for LAGs
configure stpd s0 add vlan Default ports all
